bibl.title: Epigraphy and Demography.
bibl.note: Uses papyrological sources. - I. Approaching ancient demography. - II. Fertility. - III. Nuptiality. - IV. Family relations. - V. Population size and structure. - VI. Mortality.
bibl.seg: John Davies and John Wilkes (Edd.), Epigraphy and the Historical Sciences = Proceedings of the British Academy. 177 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 101-129, 8 graphiques.
